statements: UPDATE classic_car_parts SET price = 99.99, quantity = 10 WHERE item_name = 'Engine';

UPDATE accessories SET price = 24.99, quantity = quantity - 2 WHERE id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c7';

UPDATE orders SET status = 'Delivered', date_ordered = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 100
UPDATE classic_car_parts SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = 49.99 WHERE item_name = 'Engine' AND price > 50.00;
UPDATE orders SET quantity = quantity + 2, date_ordered = '2022-09-15', status = 'Shipped' WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE inventory_parts SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE item_name = 'Screws';
UPDATE orders SET total_price = total_price * 0.9, quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE inventory_parts SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_name = 'Screwdriver';
UPDATE suppliers SET address =  '123 Main Street', email = 'supplier@example.com' WHERE name = 'ABC Company';
UPDATE car_parts SET quantity = 100 WHERE item_name = 'Engine Oil';
